DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize primary acute ankle deltoid ligament repair help restore ankle radiographic congruity functional outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Is Deltoid Ligament Repair Ankle Fracture Necessary ?
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate whether stabilization anatomic ankle deltoid ligament repair help restore ankle congruity improve functional outcome patient unstable supination-external rotation ankle fracture .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Supinationexternal rotation ankle fracture deltoid ligament incompetency Minimum 2 year clinical follow Exclusion criterion : Nonsupinationexternal rotation ankle fracture Medial malleolus fracture Incomplete clinical radiographic followup .
